'''Carl''' was a [[Hobbits|Hobbit]] of [[the Shire]].

==History==
Carl was the second son of [[Cottar]], the younger brother of [[Cotman]].

==Etymology==
''Carl'' is a common English first name, from the Anglo-Saxon concept ''[[wikipedia:Churl|Churl]]'', a free peasant.
